function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Public gatherings in parks","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Enforcing social distancing and hygiene measures","Technologies":"Mobile apps for crowd monitoring","People":"Park visitors","Owner":"Local government"},{"Description":"Population density in urban green spaces","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread due to crowded areas","Mitigation":"Limiting park capacity and promoting staggered visiting hours","Technologies":"Park reservation systems","People":"Park visitors, city residents","Owner":"Park management, local government"},{"Description":"People's mobility during confinement","Impact":"Potential spread of the disease due to movement restrictions being lifted","Mitigation":"Promoting responsible behavior and continued adherence to safety measures","Technologies":"Public transport occupancy monitoring systems","People":"City residents","Owner":"Local government"}]}
